plot: Ángel shows up in the mall where Nina, her ex-girlfriend, works on a Christmas eve. What he doesn't yet know is that to get her girlfriend back he must fight in a space-time labyrinth created by a twisted Santa Claus doll.
title: Aún hay tiempo
plot_es: Ángel shows up in the mall where Nina, her ex-girlfriend, works on a Christmas eve. What he doesn't yet know is that to get her girlfriend back he must fight in a space-time labyrinth created by a twisted Santa Claus doll.
